title: Read-only staking info UI on Profile page (getStakingInfo)

requirements.summary: Add a Profile-page staking section that queries getStakingInfo via a React Query hook and renders formatted read-only staking balances with loading and empty states.
acceptanceCriteria: A React Query hook exists to fetch staking info from the backend getStakingInfo method (identity-scoped caching, consistent with existing query patterns).
The Profile page renders a Staking section card (read-only) showing the four staking fields formatted with the existing token amount formatter.
While the query is loading, the staking section shows a loading indicator.
When the backend returns null, the staking section shows an English empty-state message indicating no staking record is available.
No stake/unstake actions or inputs are present in the staking UI.

file_operations.description: Create a dedicated React Query hook (patterned after existing identity-scoped hooks like useWspBalance) that calls the actor's getStakingInfo capability and uses an identity-scoped queryKey to prevent cross-user cache leaks. Use core-infrastructure actor wiring via useActor. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update the StakingSection to fetch staking info using the new getStakingInfo hook (instead of the existing getCallerStakingRecord hook), keep the read-only Card UI, keep/ensure a loading spinner state, and adjust the empty-state copy to clearly state that no staking record is available. Ensure no stake/unstake actions or inputs are added. Uses shadcn-ui Card for the section container; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the Profile page renders the StakingSection card in the profile layout (wired into the page content so it is reachable during normal navigation), without introducing any staking actions/inputs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
